lcMultipleSelect.lcQuestion: Which of the following statements about conditional attribute values are correct?

lcAnswerOption.lcAnswerContent: Conditional attribute values are fixed and cannot be changed.
You can specify more than one value with a filtering attribute.
Case is important in conditional attribute values.

lcMultipleSelect.lcFeedbackIncorrect: Conditional attributes are entirely up to you. You can specify more than one value with a conditional attribute (separated by spaces).
